code: import{useEffect}from'react';var useOutsideClick=function useOutsideClick(ref,callback){var handleClickOutside=function handleClickOutside(event){if(ref.current&&!ref.current.contains(event.target)){callback();}};useEffect(function(){document.addEventListener('mousedown',handleClickOutside);return function(){document.removeEventListener('mousedown',handleClickOutside);};});};export default useOutsideClick;
